item.title: Octavio add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "It is so short and jumbled and jangled, Sam, because there is nothing intelligent to say about a massacre. Everybody is supposed to be dead, to never say anything or want anything ever again. Everything is supposed to be very quiet after a massacre, and it always is, except for the birds. And what do the birds say? All there is to say about a massacre, things like "Poo-tee-weet?" -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "You never know what worse luck your bad luck has saved you from." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Ogden Nash
item.description: "Children aren't happy with nothing to ignore, And that's what parents were created for." -- Ogden Nash

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "If you end up with a boring miserable life because you listened to your mom, your dad, your teacher, your priest, or some guy on television telling you how to do your shit, then you deserve it." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Boris Pasternak
item.description: "I don't like people who have never fallen or stumbled. Their virtue is lifeless and it isn't of much value. Life hasn't revealed its beauty to them. " -- Boris Pasternak

item.title: Octavio add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Make it a rule never to give a child a book you would not read yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Children begin by loving their parents; as they grow older they judge them; sometimes they forgive them." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Don't handicap your children by making their lives easy." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Schizoid behavior is a pretty common thing in children. It's accepted, because all we adults have this unspoken agreement that children are lunatics." -- Stephen King

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "It's never too late to have a happy childhood." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Grown ups are complicated creatures, full of quirks and secrets." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Octavio add a quote by Cicero. M Tullius
item.description: "Times are bad. Children no longer obey their parents, and everyone is writing a book." -- Cicero. M Tullius
